Content: I have a collector bike that I take to shows so it sits in the garage most of the time. I change the oil every twelve months but as far as servicing other elements of the bike, I‚Äôm uncertain as to recommended service frequency. Can someone tell me how often I should have general service/maintenance performed (i.e. fluids, hoses, etc.) to keep it in good running order?
